gen:link.msg:message: v6493_m: ldr_v0046: the amount in T01.00-r0300 must equal in each column (c0xx1) the sum of the subtotal rows r0310 to r0400 for the corresponding column --> [T 01.00.b (c0011;0021;0031;0041;0051;0061;0081;0091;0101;0121;0131;0141)] {{r0300}} = {{r0310}} + {{r0320}} + {{r0330}} + {{r0340}} + {{r0350}} + {{r0360}} + {{r0365}} + {{r0370}} + {{r0380}} + {{r0390}} + {{r0400}} FAILS because iaf:numeric-equal({eba_fmt:interval($a)}, iaf:sum(({eba_fmt:interval($b)}, {eba_fmt:interval($c)}, {eba_fmt:interval($d)}, {eba_fmt:interval($e)}, {eba_fmt:interval($f)}, {eba_fmt:interval($g)}, {eba_fmt:interval($h)}, {eba_fmt:interval($i)}, {eba_fmt:interval($j)}, {eba_fmt:interval($k)}, {eba_fmt:interval($l)}))) is not true

v6493_m: [T 01.00.b (c0011;0021;0031;0041;0051;0061;0081;0091;0101;0121;0131;0141)] {{r0300}} = {{r0310}} + {{r0320}} + {{r0330}} + {{r0340}} + {{r0350}} + {{r0360}} + {{r0365}} + {{r0370}} + {{r0380}} + {{r0390}} + {{r0400}} FAILS because iaf:numeric-equal({eba_fmt:interval($a)}, iaf:sum(({eba_fmt:interval($b)}, {eba_fmt:interval($c)}, {eba_fmt:interval($d)}, {eba_fmt:interval($e)}, {eba_fmt:interval($f)}, {eba_fmt:interval($g)}, {eba_fmt:interval($h)}, {eba_fmt:interval($i)}, {eba_fmt:interval($j)}, {eba_fmt:interval($k)}, {eba_fmt:interval($l)}))) is not true
